name: SeniorAdultWellnessVisit
title: Senior Adult Wellness Visit
description: This value set created to support a measure for annual wellness visit for adults >= 65 years of age.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Annual wellness visit),(Data Element Scope: Encounter, procedure, claim),(Inclusion Criteria: Wellness visits),(Exclusion Criteria: Other ambulatory visits that are not specifically wellness/preventive.)

concept.display: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management of an individual including an age and gender appropriate history, examination, counseling/anticipatory guidance/risk factor reduction interventions, and the ordering of laboratory/diagnostic procedures, new patient; 65 years and older

Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management of an individual including an age and gender appropriate history, examination, counseling/anticipatory guidance/risk factor reduction interventions, and the ordering of laboratory/diagnostic procedures, established patient; 65 years and older

contains.display: Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management of an individual including an age and gender appropriate history, examination, counseling/anticipatory guidance/risk factor reduction interventions, and the ordering of laboratory/diagnostic procedures, new patient; 65 years and older

Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management of an individual including an age and gender appropriate history, examination, counseling/anticipatory guidance/risk factor reduction interventions, and the ordering of laboratory/diagnostic procedures, established patient; 65 years and older
